lyrics: CG                       D/F#
L    Your colors fading      'Cause I kept you waiting
C       Em7                        Cadd9
LIt's a wild wild world and you're a wild wild girl
CG                           D/F#
L    Our sun's still shining      but it seems half the size
C       Em7                    Cadd9
LAnd it's a wild wild world out here
CAm7                     D
L   Before my time ru-uns out
C        Em           C   G      D/F#     Em            C    G      D/F#
LWhat if I run away to Ma - ars? Would you find me in the sta - ars?
CEm               C           G            D/F#
LWould you miss me in the end if I run out of oxygen
C     Em           C   G       D/F#
LWhen I run away to Ma - ars?
CG                                 D/F#
L    I can't tell which way is home  I've been gone for so long
C        Em7              Cadd9
LIt's an empty world up   here
CG                           D/F#
L    I skip stones and wonder   How long till I'm discovered?
C      Em7            Cadd9
LIt's a quiet life up here
CAm7                     D
L   Before my time ru-uns out
C        Em           C   G      D/F#     Em            C    G      D/F#
LWhat if I run away to Ma - ars? Would you find me in the sta - ars?
CEm               C           G            D/F#
LWould you miss me in the end if I run out of oxygen
C     Em           C   G       D/F#
LWhen I run away to Ma - ars?
CAm7                 Dsus4  D
L    3, 2, 1, I miss yooooooou
CAm7                  Dsus4    D
L    I'm sorry I got iss- uuuuuuues
C        Em           C   G               Em            C    G
LWhat if I run away to Ma - ars? Would you find me in the sta - ars?
CEm               C           G            D/F#
LWould you miss me in the end if I run out of oxygen
C     Em           C   G
